data.title: Arthur Lee Rucker
data.meta_description: On Wednesday, March 16, 2022, Arthur Lee Rucker joined Jean, the love of his life, in eternal rest. Born March 28, 1940, Art was known for his smile and the goodness and quiet grace he imparted on the world.
